description: Salford centre Nene MacDonald joins Championship side Oldham on a three-match loan deal.
title: Nene MacDonald: Salford Red Devils centre joins Oldham on loan
title_page: Nene MacDonald: Salford Red Devils centre joins Oldham on loan - BBC Sport
maintext:
Salford centre Nene MacDonald has joined Championship side Oldham on a three-match loan deal.
The Papua New Guinea international was included in the Super League Dream Team last year but is unable to feature for the beleaguered Red Devils at present because of the sustainability cap the club is working under.
Marc Sneyd, Brad Singleton and Tim Lafai have all left the club permanently since the start of the campaign.
The 30-year-old joins a Roughyeds side who are second in the second tier and face Barrow in the 1895 Cup on Sunday.
